portlet.description: Logs a user on to the Jetspeed portal by entering a username and password. Authenticates using full Jetspeed Active Authentication.
ユーザー名とパスワードを入力して、ユーザーがポータルにログインできます。アクティブ認証を利用して認証します。
portlet.display-name: アクティブ認証を用いたログイン

portlet.description: Logs a user on to the Jetspeed portal by entering a username and password in an XHTML form. Authenticates using full Jetspeed Active Authentication.
XHTMLフォームでユーザー名とパスワードを入力して、ユーザーがポータルにログインできます。アクティブ認証を利用して認証します。
portlet.display-name: アクティブ認証を用いたログイン(XHTML Basic用)

portlet.description: Logs a user on to the Jetspeed portal using an OpenID Provider and a built in Relaying Party servlet implmentation. Copies and maintains user information in Jetspeed user data on login.

init-param.description: Display names for OpenID provider buttons.
init-param.name: providerLabels

init-param.description: Domain names for OpenID provider buttons.
init-param.name: providerDomains

init-param.description: Enable OpenID provider or URL entry.
init-param.name: enableOpenIDEntry

init-param.description: Enable portlet init parameter registration configuration.
init-param.name: enableRegistrationConfig

init-param.description: Global enable new user registration.
init-param.name: enableRegistration

init-param.description: Global new user template directory to be used for registration.
init-param.name: newUserTemplateDirectory

init-param.description: Global subsite root folder to be used for registration.
init-param.name: subsiteRootFolder

init-param.description: Global roles to be assigned at registration.
init-param.name: roles

init-param.description: Global groups to be assigned at registration.
init-param.name: groups

init-param.description: Global profiling rule names to be assigned at registration.
init-param.name: rulesNames

init-param.description: Global profiling rule values to be assigned at registration.
init-param.name: rulesValues

portlet.description: Portlet for changing the password of the current, logged on user.
現在ログイン中のユーザーパスワードを変更します。
更改当前登陆用户的密码。
更改當前登陸用戶的密碼。

init-param.description: This parameter sets the template used in view mode.
init-param.name: ViewPage

portlet.description: You can edit SSO Site Credentials.
SSO 現在ログイン中のユーザーパスワードを変更します。
SSO 更改当前登陆用户的密码。
SSO 更改當前登陸用戶的密碼。

init-param.description: This parameter sets the template used in view mode.
init-param.name: ViewPage

portlet.description: SSO Sites Browser displays a list of all configured SSO sites in the portal. From here you can select SSO Sites for editing. Place this portlet on the same page as the SSO Details portlet.
SSO サイトブラウザポートレットは、ポータル内の構成された、すべての SSO サイトの一覧を表示します。ここから、編集したい SSO サイトを選択できます。
SSO 站点浏览 Portlet
SSO 站點流覽 Portlet

init-param.description: This parameter sets the template used in view mode.
init-param.name: ViewPage

portlet.description: The SSO Site Details portlet edits the credentials and site location for a single SSO Site. Place this portlet on the same page as the SSO Browser portlet.
SSO サイト詳細ポートレットは、SSO サイト用の資格およびサイトの場所を編集できます。このポートレットは、SSOブラウザポートレットと同じページに置いてください。
SSO 详情 Portlet
SSO 詳情 Portlet

init-param.description: This parameter sets the template used in view mode.
init-param.name: ViewPage

portlet.description: Locale Selector is a portlet to select your preferred locale (language).
言語選択はユーザーのロケールを選択するためのポートレットです。
选择你使用的语言
選擇你使用的語言

portlet-info.title: Locale Selector
portlet-info.short-title: This is a portlet to select your preferred locale

portlet.description: Provides statistics about portal access hits by page, portlet, and by user. Statistical results are sorted by highest hit rate.
ページ、ポートレット、ユーザーごとのポータルアクセスについての統計機能を提供します。統計結果は、ヒット割合が高い順にソートされます。
提供关于门户页面、Portlet、用户的状态信息。
提供關於門戶頁面、Portlet、用戶的狀態資訊。

init-param.description: This parameter sets the template used in view mode.
init-param.name: ViewPage

portlet.description: Provides users with the ability to request a new password to be sent to their email address.
ユーザーに新規パスワードをメールアドレスに送信要求をする機能を提供します。
忘记密码，使用邮件发送新的密码给用户。
忘記密碼，使用郵件發送新的密碼給用戶。
portlet.display-name: パスワード再発行ポートレット

init-param.description: This parameter sets the template used in view mode.
init-param.name: ViewPage

init-param.description: This parameter sets the template used to send the Email for Forgotten password
init-param.name: emailTemplateLocation

init-param.description: This parameter sets the template used to send the Email for Forgotten password
init-param.name: emailTemplateName

init-param.description: This parameter sets the url to which folks will return after they receive an email
init-param.name: returnURL

init-param.description: This parameter sets the URL to which people will go after they successfully complete their form for forgotten password
init-param.name: redirectPath

portlet.description: Provides users with the ability to click and update their password automatically after completing the user registration process.
ユーザー登録完了後にパスワードを更新する機能を提供します。
忘记密码，使用email发送更新密码的连接。
忘記密碼，使用email發送更新密碼的連接。
portlet.display-name: パスワード再発行受付ポートレット

init-param.description: This parameter sets the template used in view mode.
init-param.name: ViewPage

portlet.description: Provides users with the ability register as a new user with the portal.
ユーザーにポータルの新規登録する機能を提供します。
注册一个新的门户用户
註冊一個新的門戶用戶
portlet.display-name: ユーザー登録ポートレット

init-param.description: This parameter sets the template used in view mode.
init-param.name: ViewPage

init-param.description: This option will generate a new password for each user registration
init-param.name: Option_Generate_Passwords

init-param.description: This option will force email address to be system wide unique
init-param.name: Option_Emails_System_Unique

init-param.description: This option will use the email address as the username
init-param.name: Option_Use_Email_As_Username

init-param.description: This parameter sets the url to which folks will return after they receive an email
init-param.name: returnURL

init-param.description: This parameter sets the URL to which people will go after they successfully complete their form for forgotten password
init-param.name: redirectPath

init-param.description: This is the template in which you setup an email to be sent after user exists
init-param.name: emailTemplateLocation

init-param.description: This is the template in which you setup an email to be sent after user exists
init-param.name: emailTemplateName

init-param.description: Profiling rules to be assigned at registration.
init-param.name: rulesNames

init-param.description: Profiling rules to be assigned at registration.
init-param.name: rulesValues

portlet.description: Logs a user on to the Jetspeed portal by entering a username and password. Authentication bypasses JAAS and active authentication.
ユーザー名とパスワードを入力して、ユーザーがポータルにログインできます。JAAS およびアクティブ認証を回避した認証です。
Policy Editor for managing the Jetspeed JAAS Security Policy. The policy is a standard Java security policy (JAAS), stored in a database. Portlet, page, and folder permissions are managed here.
JAAS セキュリティポリシーを管理するポリシーエディタです。ポリシーはJava セキュリティポリシー(JAAS)標準で、データベースに格納されます。ポートレット、ページおよびフォルダのパーミッションはここで管理できます。
portlet.display-name: セキュリティパーミッションポリシー

portlet.description: Declarative Security Constraint editor. Manages PSML global security constraints to grant or deny access to pages and folders.
宣言的セキュリティ制限エディタです。ページとフォルダへのアクセスを許可または拒否するためのPSMLグローバルセキュリティ制限を管理します。
Display the date and time in a simple string format.
簡単な文字列フォーマットで日付と時間を表示します。
Portlet Selector for adding portlets to your page. Categories classify portlets by indexed keywords to help users find portlets.
ページにポートレットを塚するポートレット選択です。カテゴリは、ポートレットを検索するために役立つ索引されたキーワードでポートレットを分類しています。
A read only view of the site map available to the current user
現在のユーザーで利用可能なサイトマップをリードオンリーで表示します。

init-param.description: This parameter sets the template used in view mode.
init-param.name: ViewPage

portlet.description: The Portal Site Manager displays a hierarchical view of the entire portal site. From here you can add, edit, and delete folders, links, and pages.
ポータルサイトマネージャは、ポータルサイト全体の階層的な表示を提供します。ここから、フォルダ、リンクおよびページを追加・偏執・削除することができます。
portlet.display-name: ポータルサイトマネージャ

portlet.description: Remote Portlet Application Deployer for Jetspeed.
Jetspeed用リモートポートレットアプリケーション配備
portlet.display-name: リモートポートレットアプリケーション配備(RPAD)

portlet.description: Portlet Tracking Manager
ポートレットトラッキングマネージャ
portlet.display-name: ポートレットトラッキングマネージャ

portlet.description: Welcome to Jetspeed
Jetspeedにようこそ
About Jetspeed
Jetspeedについて
Jetspeed Developer Information
Jetspeed 開発者情報
Provides common custom config mode edit portlet.

init-param.description: This parameter sets the template used in config mode.
init-param.name: ConfigPage

portlet.description: Provides common custom preview mode portlet.
Content Viewer displays the content of an HTML, PDF, or other file types from any where on the file system, or relative to the portlet application.
The User Browser displays a list of users managed in this portal. From here you can select users for editing.
The Group Browser displays a list of groups managed in this portal. From here you can select groups for editing.
The Roles Browser displays a list of roles managed in this portal. From here you can select roles for editing.
Profiler Administration
The Portal Data Serializer imports and exports Jetspeed data from and to Jetspeed schema. From here you import and export users, groups, roles and other Jetspeed objects.

Places an HTML IFrame with reverse proxied url , with Jetspeed SSO enabled, inside a portlet for easily hosting other web application within a portlet. Sizes of both normal and maximized modes are configurable in edit mode.

preference.name: EDITABLEPREFS
preference.value: TITLE, SRC, PROXYREMOTEURL, PROXYLOCALPATH, WIDTH, HEIGHT, MAX-WIDTH, MAX-HEIGHT, SCROLLING, AUTORESIZE, VISITLASTPAGE

portlet.description: Places an HTML IFrame with reverse proxied url , with Jetspeed SSO enabled, inside a portlet for easily hosting other web application within a portlet. Sizes of both normal and maximized modes are configurable in edit mode.
portlet.display-name: SSO Form Based Authentication Reverse Proxy IFrame Portlet

preference.name: EDITABLEPREFS
preference.value: TITLE, SRC, PROXYREMOTEURL, PROXYLOCALPATH, WIDTH, HEIGHT, MAX-WIDTH, MAX-HEIGHT, SCROLLING, AUTORESIZE, VISITLASTPAGE

portlet.description: Places an HTML IFrame inside a portlet for easily hosting other web application within a portlet. Sizes of both normal and maximized modes are configurable in edit mode. Additional Single-Signon Support to automatically log on this portlet to other web sites.

preference.name: EDITABLEPREFS
preference.value: TITLE, SRC, WIDTH, HEIGHT, MAX-WIDTH, MAX-HEIGHT, SCROLLING, AUTORESIZE, VISITLASTPAGE, sso.type, sso.url.Principal, sso.url.Credential, sso.form.Action, sso.form.Principal, sso.form.Credential, sso.form.Args

portlet.description: Includes the content of another website inside the portal without using frames. All links are rewritten back to the portal to attempt to proxy all content through the portal. Additional Single-Signon Support to automatically log on this portlet to other web sites and manage sessions.
SSO Demo help information, contains credentials for SSO demo portlets.
SSO Proxy Portlet
The Portlet Registry Manager Application List displays a lost of portlet applications deployed to this portal registry. From here you deploy, undeploy, start, stop and edit portlet applications.
Application Details List
Portlet Details Manager
MFA Login

init-param.name: randomQuestions
init-param.value: What was the first and last name of your favorite teacher? What was your favorite sport, team, or athlete when you were 16? What was your favorite place to visit when you were 16? Who was your favorite actor, musician, or artist when you were in high-school? What is the first name of your first boyfriend? What is the first name of your first girlfriend? What is the name of your first elementary school? What was the high school mascot at the last high school you attended? In what city was your first elementary school? In what city was your mother born? In what city was your father born? What is the first name of your maternal grandmother (your mother's mother)? What is the first name of your paternal grandmother (your father's mother)? What is the first name of your maternal grandfather (your mother's father)? What is the first name of your paternal grandfather (your father's father)? Who was your first employer? In what city did you meet your spouse? What was the first name of your first roommate during college? In what city did you get married? How old were you at your wedding? What was the first name of the best man at your wedding? What was the first name of the maid of honor at your wedding?

portlet.description: A Popup portlet for selecting a single user from a list of users. Usually not placed on a page directly, but accessed by Jetspeed over the portlet pipeline in a popup window.
ユーザー一覧からユーザーを選択するポップアップポートレットです。通常、直接ページ上には置かれません。ポップアップウィンドウ内でポートレットのパイプライン外でポータルからアクセスされます。
选择用户的Portlet
選擇用戶的Portlet

init-param.name: ViewPage

portlet.description: A Popup portlet for selecting a single group from a list of groups. Usually not placed on a page directly, but accessed by Jetspeed over the portlet pipeline in a popup window.
グループ一覧からグループを選択するポップアップポートレットです。通常、ページ上には置かれません。ポップアップウィンドウ内でポートレットのパイプライン外でポータルからアクセスされます。
选择组的Portlet
選擇組的Portlet
portlet.display-name: グループ選択(ポップアップ)

init-param.name: ViewPage

portlet.description: A Popup portlet for selecting a single role from a list of roles. Usually not placed on a page directly, but accessed by Jetspeed over the portlet pipeline in a popup window.
ロール一覧からロールを選択するポップアップポートレットです。通常、ページ上には置かれません。ポップアップウィンドウ内でポートレットのパイプライン外でポータルからアクセスされます。
选择角色的Portlet
選擇角色的Portlet

portlet.description: Monitor the Jetspeed Caches.
The Developer User Browser displays a list of users managed in this portal with the role of dev (Developer). From here you can select users for editing.

The Delegated User Manager displays a filtered list of users. Filtering by Group supports mgr-* prefix in the filteredGroup preference. Example: filteredGroup == mgr-engineering, then the 'engineering' group will be auto-added Users of this portlet are meant to be 'delegated' administrators and should have roles like mgr-engineering where the 'engineering' suffix matches the name of the Group they are delegated to manage.
Jetspeed toolbox and portlet selection controller.
Jetspeed Spaces Manager for maintaining spaces
Jetspeed spaces navigation management controller.
Jetspeed page navigation management controller.
Jetspeed Spaces Administrative List.
Jetspeed Breadcrumb Menu widget
Jetspeed Ajax User Manager, supporting paging.

Portal DynamicPage enabled content portlet that displays content of another website inside the portal without using frames. All links are rewritten back to the portal to attempt to proxy all content through the portal.

Places an HTML IFrame inside a portlet for easily hosting other web application content within a portlet. This portlet will display a configured page when the current session is not logged in using a specified OpenID provider. Sizes of both normal and maximized modes are configurable in edit mode.

preference.name: EDITABLEPREFS
preference.value: TITLE, SRC, WIDTH, HEIGHT, MAX-WIDTH, MAX-HEIGHT, SCROLLING, AUTORESIZE, VISITLASTPAGE, REQUIREDOPENIDPROVIDER
